home.welcomeMessage: Welcome to Education Empower Sri Lanka
home.description: Education Empower Sri Lanka is a national initiative established to enhance equal access to quality education and empower learners of all ages across the island. This platform aims to serve students, educators, and institutions through digital resources, modern learning tools, and centralized access to academic support.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: Have questions or feedback? Reach out to us ‚Äî we're here to support your learning journey.
contact.subText: Your suggestions help us grow stronger

ServiceSection.sectionDescription: We provide a variety of services to support learners of all ages and backgrounds.

services.title: Help finding classes
services.description: Get matched with the right educational programs or classes tailored to your goals.

services.title: Job opportunities
services.description: Discover employment and internship options related to your skills and interests.

services.title: Providing resources
services.description: Access curated learning materials, tools, and platforms to support your education.

services.title: Counseling and guidance
services.description: Receive academic and career counseling to plan your educational journey with confidence.

ServiceSection.noServices: No services available at the moment.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.text: To be Sri Lanka‚Äôs leading education center, nurturing minds, fostering innovation, and empowering lifelong learning.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.goalAccess: Ensure quality education access for all
mission.continuousLearning: Foster a culture of continuous learning

featureCards.schoolsLabel: Schools Across Sri Lanka ‚Äî Our Goal
featureCards.educationHighlight: On a Mission to Empower Sri Lankan Education

marketOperations.title: How the Platform Operates
marketOperations.para1: The Education Empower Sri Lanka platform collaborates with government bodies, local schools, and NGOs to deliver trusted academic content and facilitate training for both teachers and students.
marketOperations.para2: Our virtual classrooms, learning repositories, and exam preparation tools are made accessible through a centralized system with minimal cost to the end user.
marketOperations.para3: This initiative minimizes resource gaps and provides an efficient, transparent model for nationwide educational service delivery.
marketOperations.para4: We also support offline access in remote regions through partner learning hubs and community education points.
